sources.title: Campus Sleuth
sources.description: Campus Sleuth Freddie Stewart, June Pressier, Noel Neill 1948 Monogram Pictures This is the sixth of eight films in The Teen Agers series.

metadata.Plot: A photographer is choked to death just outside of where a college dance is being held. The body is discovered by Lee Watson (Warren Mills), but promptly disappears, as it is being whisked from one point to another on the campus by a night watchman, who is an ex-convict. However, he is not the killer and Freddie TRimball (Freddie Stewart), Betty Rogers (Noel Neill), Dodie Rogers (June Preisser) and Lee set out to find the culprit, who managed to put a big damper on the Big Dance.
metadata.Actors: Freddie Stewart, June Preisser, Warren Mills
